column1: The '''''Tolkien Calendar 1985''''' was the official Tolkien calendar published by [[Unwin Hyman
column2: Unwin Paperbacks]] in [[1984]]. It features art by [[Inger Edelfeldt]] based on ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' and ''[[The Silmarillion]]''.

column1: * January - "[[:File:Inger Edelfeldt - A Long Expected Party.jpg
* April - "[[:File:Inger Edelfeldt - Pippin and Merry Captured by Orcs.jpg
column2: Pippin and Merry Captured by Orcs]]"

column1: * July - "[[:File:Inger Edelfeldt - To the Stone of Erech.jpg
* October - "[[:File:Inger Edelfeldt - The Crowning of Aragorn.jpg
* November - "[[:File:Inger Edelfeldt - The Scouring of the Shire.jpg
* December - "[[:File:Inger Edelfeldt - The Death of Glaurung.jpg
